ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Well a lightstone is a stone that you get off wisp that gives you light so you can see better in the dark.  They are so valuable cause they can be very hard to
ygData.messageBody:
Well a lightstone is a stone that you get off wisp that gives you light so
you can see better in the dark. They are so valuable cause they can be very
hard to get, you have to have magic or a magic weapon to beat a Wisp.
Everyone buys them BUT mainly humans and other races that can't see in the
dark.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: curtis bennett <die_kluge@...>
>
> Ok, excuse my ignornace, but what are lightstones, and why are they
> so valuable?
>
>
